name: Where's My Body
description:
"You're not supposed to be here, yet." Says Death before sending you back to earth.

Hi, you will be playing as Dave & you will search for your body in order to live again. Submitted for Scream Jam 2021.

Controls

  • WASD to move around.
  • E to possess someone.
  • LMB to phase through thin walls (as a ghost), interact certain objects (as a human).

Have fun!

Consider rating the game at the Scream Jam 2021  if you like it!
